text: [Music] we're here on the outskirts of enac in rural damascus and we've just launched a vaccination campaign for ppr testifiminal it's a viral disease of sheep and goats it's quite serious [Music] it's part of a global campaign to eradicate this disease but each it requires an international effort but also a national effort in even down to local village level to to vaccinate large numbers of animals in a short period of time to make sure that the disease isn't present and isn't spreading so this campaign is funded in syria by three projects with their fail so three three donors the russian projects are diffid project and orchard donors actually very different perspectives but they all agree on one thing that this disease is a priority and should be uh should be tackled um the scale of the campaign is going to be around about eight million doses to be given out in the next two to three weeks it's a very concentrated campaign the vaccine itself is very temp temperature sensitive so we have to be very careful about the cold chain and we visited the cold store where the where the vaccine is being held it's uh it's come from jordan and it's kept at between two two to eight degrees centigrade the campaign's going to reach 180 000 herders uh small scale livestock keepers it enables them to protect their assets and ultimately will help them achieve zero hunger
